li.label: Dreamt about redhead with beard
li.description: It started off at school, where I began to realize something was wrong. Everyone I saw looked like they could barely contain themselves from instantly becoming violent, and they had this look in their eye like they had just spotted the best prey they had ever seen, but were being held back by something. I remember thinking "No way, I'm out", and ran home as fast as I could. Some of it is blurry, but I remember coming across people that I knew, either friends or family, or people from the neighborhood, telling me to get home, that it's not safe. Finally I make it there, put the key in the front door, open it, and I am literally surrounded by all of those same people, only now they look like the one's at school, and there stands the redhead with the beard. Without saying a word she lunges at me and out came the fangs right into my neck. ~Rinzler0001

I woke up with pain in that place... ~Backrevol

li.label: Dreamt about moon armageddon
li.description: I awoke in my room. Felt a bit thirsty so I went to the kitchen to drink some water. Opened window to let some fresh air in and there was a enormous moon, everything was shaking almost like an earthquake. Orange light iluminated surroundings. Buildings were floating here and there, like gravity never existed. Moon was getting closer. Shaking become stronger. I heard some screams. Then some odd force hit me and I colapsed. ~Backrevol
